Others: The Denver Nuggets lost to the Phoenix Suns 118-114 in a preseason game.
The Suns did not play Kevin Durant, Bradley Beal, or Devin Booker in this game.
Nuggets head coach Michael Malone was unhappy with his team's performance, particularly their third quarter performance.
Malone called out his team for giving up 37 points in the third quarter from three-point line, stating it was embarrassing.
Malone emphasized the need for his team to improve before opening night.
